extendedIngredients.name: cranberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 12-ounce bag fresh cranberries, picked and rinsed

recipes.title: cranberry sauce with apple and orange
recipes.instructions: Stir together cranberries, apples, brown sugar, orange juice, allspice and salt in a large saucepan.  Place over medium heat and bring to a simmer, stirring often.  Continue cooking, stirring often until the cranberries have popped and the mixture thickens, about 5 minutes.  Remove from heat. Meanwhile, zest orange. To supreme the orange: Cut skin and white pith off the orange.  Cut between membranes to remove individual segments, working all the way around the orange.  Gently stir the zest and orange segments into the compote.  Discard orange membrane and peel.  Cool compote completely, about 2 hours.

steps.step: Stir together cranberries, apples, brown sugar, orange juice, allspice and salt in a large saucepan.
Place over medium heat and bring to a simmer, stirring often.  Continue cooking, stirring often until the cranberries have popped and the mixture thickens, about 5 minutes.
